channel.title: Spokewiki
channel.itunes:subtitle: Listen to popular wikipedia articles
channel.itunes:author: Spokewiki
channel.itunes:summary: spokewiki tracks current events and pulls the wikipedia article, does minor editing to improve readability then uses Amazon Polly to voice the article. We try our best to be fair, accurate and open to feedback.
channel.content:encoded: spokewiki tracks current events and pulls the wikipedia article, does minor editing to improve readability then uses Amazon Polly to voice the article. We try our best to be fair, accurate and open to feedback.

item.title: Silicon Valley Bank
item.description: On March 10, 2023, Silicon Valley Bank is the second largest bank collapse in US history but FDIC backed all depositors with full protection to get their money out.
item.itunes:title: Silicon Valley Bank
item.itunes:author: Spokewiki
item.itunes:summary: On March 10, 2023, Silicon Valley Bank is the second largest bank collapse in US history but FDIC backed all depositors with full protection to get their money out.
item.content:encoded: On March 10, 2023, Silicon Valley Bank is the second largest bank collapse in US history but FDIC backed all depositors with full protection to get their money out.
